events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue was classified under Refund due to customer's request for money back after receiving incorrect product.
An available support agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for the customer.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear you got the wrong item. I’ll help you with your refund process.
Could you please provide a photo of the item you received along with your order number to proceed?
I have attached the picture showing the wrong product and here is my order number: 123456789.
Thank you for the info. We will initiate your refund immediately and you should see the amount credited in 3-5 business days.
Thanks for the quick response and help. I appreciate the prompt refund processing.
Your refund is now processed and the case is considered resolved. Please contact us for any further assistance.
Just checking in to confirm that you received the refund successfully and if there is anything else we can do.
Since the refund was successfully received and no further issues were reported, we are closing this case now.
